sub_title: Service Manager BeNeLux and Dutch Antilles at Vestas
summary:
Seasoned service and after sales manager with 15+ years experience in the machine industry, medical industry and automotive industry.

Broad experience in managing international service and spare parts processes and working with manufacturers, distributors, dealer networks and customers.
Solid track record in policy development and implementation.
Strategic and customer focused mindset. People manager.
Result driven, enthusiastic and analytical, with a focus on creating support for change.
